profile.title: Two controls from AC, with parameters on subcontrols

param.desc: CAT PERSON #1 (primary), CAT PERSON #2 (asst), FURTHER CAT PERSONS - organization-defined duties of individuals
param.value: CAT PERSON #1 (primary), CAT PERSON #2 (asst), FURTHER CAT PERSONS

param.desc: CAT FOOD STATION; LITTER BOX; REGULAR ACCESS TO OUTDOORS - organization-defined security functions (deployed in hardware, software, and firmware) and security-relevant information
param.value: CAT FOOD STATION; LITTER BOX; REGULAR ACCESS TO OUTDOORS

param.desc: REGULAR FEEDINGS AND PROVISION OF TREATS - organization-defined security functions or security-relevant information
param.value: REGULAR FEEDINGS AND PROVISION OF TREATS

param.desc: COMMUNICATIVE BEHAVIORS SUCH AS RUBBING LEGS - organization-defined privileged commands
param.value: COMMUNICATIVE BEHAVIORS SUCH AS RUBBING LEGS

param.desc: FOREMENTIONED PET CARETAKERS AND STAFF - organization-defined personnel or roles
PET CARETAKERS - organization-defined roles or classes of users
